name: portfolio
description: This is my new modified portfolio, it has a lot of new changes; CSR/BSR with ReactJS in which I included throught React components. There is a change in icons, I have used Font Awesome for version 1.0.0 and in this version I am using Bootstrap Icons. I deleted the template languague PUG because no template is being served from, now I have implemented SSR with React and ReactDOM. This project are using lowDB like DB to register the comments by a API call from the client by React. There are enviroment variables too, and another changes more. The next version will include more things like React writed with TypeScript, Service Worker, etc.
author: Felix Antonio
